**Purpose**: this application is aimed to explore the diabetes data and find factors that have great influence on the occurrence of diabetes. 

**Structure**: this shiny app has four pages, including `About`, `Data`, `Data Exploration`, `Modeling`, and `Prediction`.

`About` page: introduces the purpose of the app and each page of the app and discusses the data and its source.

`Data` page: displays the data set used in this app and allows users to subset and save the complete and subsetted data.

`Data Exploration` page: uses data visualization and statistical techniques to find pattern or issues in the data set. 

`Modeling` page: allows users to choose from three different models for fitting and predicting.
